<page title>: NEC Display 32 LED Edge Lit Commercial Grade Display w Integrated Tuner E324 | eBay
general information: Marketing Information The 32" NEC E324, an LED edge-lit, commercial-grade display, is ideal for education, corporate and other digital signage applications. Compared to previous generation displays, this model's edge-lit LED backlighting allows for reduced power consumption, a thinner depth, a smaller bezel and lighter weight. High definition resolution delivers stunning image quality for a variety of content, and the E324's integrated tuner and speakers allow users to enjoy high-definition broadcast capabilities.
miscellaneous: Package Contents 32" LED Edge-lit Commercial-Grade Display w/ Integrated Tuner Power cord VGA cable (Mini 15-pin D-sub) Wireless remote control Batteries CD-ROM (user manual) Stand Thumbscrews RS-232 adaptor
